bibl.title: Hazzard v. Aguirre and Price. Memo from Judge
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court of Washington Territory, Second Judicial District

div1.p: after hearing the testimony and the argument of criminal that there is no just ground for the allowance of the plaintiffs prayer to be released from custody it is ordered that the said writ he demed are that the petitioner be remanded to the custody of the defendants are that the defendants have full upon against plaintiff for them to until of the plaintiff excepted, and immediately gone notice in open house that they he appeared the said cause to the supreme Court of the Territory of Washington It is therefore ordered that the said appeal be and the same is hereby allowed, and the notice of appeal so given by plaintiff is hereby ordered entered in the governal of this house and it is further ordered star the said plaintiff George Hazzard be released from custody upon giving a bond to the said defendants in that penal saw of one thousand
